trigger_event: Code commit to a feature branch
success_criteria: Linting passes; Unit test coverage > 80%; All unit tests pass; No new critical issues in SonarQube.
failure_action: Block merge to main branch; Notify developer.
business_impact: Prevents basic errors and maintains code quality in the main branch.

success_criteria: All API contract tests (Pact) pass; Automated smoke test suite (critical E2E paths) passes.
failure_action: Trigger automated rollback of the deployment; Create P1 incident ticket.
escalation_procedure: Alert on-call engineer and QA lead.
business_impact: Prevents broken builds from staying in the main testing environment.

success_criteria: Full E2E regression suite passes; Manual exploratory testing completed by QA; Product Owner signs off on UAT.
failure_action: Block promotion to Production; Create release-blocking bug tickets.
business_impact: Final quality check to ensure release readiness and prevent production defects.
